data.lyric:
[ti:d**g Addiction (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Top (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Drug Addiction (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:12.31]Wanna take it back to where it started
[00:17.07]Life of the party right where my heart at
[00:23.62]Soon what I want come in I say anything go
[00:27.86]On the road cool ride 'round with the top down
[00:30.91]Nowhere to go decide that I just ride 'round
[00:34.02]She a d**g abuser from a broken heart
[00:36.78]Ooh ooh
[00:37.53]Got a bad addiction I been d**gging hard all month long
[00:40.96]I'm in that Wraith ain't got nothing
[00:42.20]But some residue on me
[00:43.16]I'm chasing a check to the morning
[00:44.55]I'm in the trenches with smokers and steppers and loners
[00:46.42]Some only want scheduled two only
[00:47.72]Manufacturer a convicted felon I'm keeping my weapon
[00:49.91]I'm pouring' more blood on that money
[00:51.23]Owe it all to the young' who feel that he owe the ones
[00:53.59]Put addiction 'fore hunger
[00:54.38]I ain't got no peak leave blood inside the streets
[00:57.50]Use to wash my clothes under the sink
[00:59.32]Now young n***a walk on mink
[01:00.95]Taking care of my dawg made myself a boss
[01:02.73]They gon' take one off the blink
[01:04.25]'Fore a n***a hit fame I was sitting in a cell
[01:06.22]Young n***a taking off them links
[01:07.88]She gon' play with her nose all night
[01:09.59]Shoot three doses 'fore the night end lipstick bottle full of white
[01:13.72]I told her that I like it I like it
[01:15.88]These n***as they talk too much can't tell what I did I did
[01:19.49]I always been there for you you don't even excite me
[01:21.70]Wanna take it back to where it started
[01:25.67]Life of the party right where my heart at
[01:31.66]Soon what I want come in I say anything go
[01:35.73]Putting you over those h*es my money gon' grow
[01:38.25]Tell 'em it's tax evasion
[01:39.48]I ain't discussing business not over the phone
[01:41.20]Meet up I'm real impatient relocate
[01:43.49]I'ma switch up locations
[01:44.23]Tell 'em I need me a spot with a vacant
[01:46.25]Where I'm from I'm a 38 Baby
[01:47.75]Never give up try again like Plankton
[01:49.76]B***h n***a still hating and his ship start sinking
[01:51.75]Titanic watch gon' save my life
[01:53.56]They can't get the plank in
[01:55.22]Yeah
[01:55.69]He's my taking my life all my thanks
[01:58.86]Pain in his eyes up all night constant thinking
[02:02.47]Wanna take it back to where it started
[02:06.74]Life of the party right where my heart at
[02:12.89]Soon what I want come in I say anything go
[02:17.67]Ooh understand the pain
data.trans:
[ti:Drug Addiction (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Top (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:12.31]想要回到最开始的地方
[00:17.07]派对生活 就在我的心中
[00:23.62]很快 我想要的都有了 我却觉得什么都不长久
[00:27.86]在路上 开着敞篷车到处转悠
[00:30.91]无处可去 我决定就这样随便转转
[00:34.02]她心碎之后便沉溺于那种东西
[00:36.78]//
[00:37.53]养成了坏习惯 我一整月都在不要命地吸
[00:40.96]我开着劳斯莱斯魅影 感觉自己一无所有
[00:42.20]只剩一些残留的回忆
[00:43.16]我一直在追逐钱财
[00:44.55]我在贫民窟 身边都是烟民 *君子 孤独的人
[00:46.42]有些人只想要那种东西
[00:47.72]生产商就是罪犯 我保留着自己的武器
[00:49.91]我要为钱付出更多心血
[00:51.23]都是年轻时候不懂事 感觉自己对别人有亏欠
[00:53.59]肚子都填不饱 却要去买那种东西
[00:54.38]我没有到达巅峰 在街头挥洒血汗
[00:57.50]曾经我得在洗脸盆里自己洗衣服
[00:59.32]现在我穿的是貂皮大衣
[01:00.95]照顾我的兄弟们 自己做了老板
[01:02.73]他们眨眼之间就能拥有很多东西
[01:04.25]在我出名之前 我在监狱里蹲着
[01:06.22]后来终于摆脱了枷锁
[01:07.88]她会整夜沉溺于那种东西
[01:09.59]天亮之前 打三针 口红瓶里装的都是白色粉末
[01:13.72]我告诉她 我喜欢
[01:15.88]这些家伙话太多 不能告诉他们我做了什么
[01:19.49]我一直在你身旁 你从来都没让我激动过
[01:21.70]想要回到最开始的地方
[01:25.67]派对生活 就在我的心中
[01:31.66]很快 我想要的都有了 我却觉得什么都不长久
[01:35.73]把你看得比其他女人都重要 我的钱不断增加
[01:38.25]告诉他们 这就是在逃税
[01:39.48]我不会讨论生意的事 不会在电话上谈
[01:41.20]见面谈 我真的很没耐心 换个地方
[01:43.49]我要换个位置
[01:44.23]告诉他们 我需要一个空位
[01:46.25]在我的家乡 我是随时带着枪的
[01:47.75]永不放弃 再试一次 就像痞老板
[01:49.76]有些家伙还是恨我 他的小船开始沉没
[01:51.75]超大的手表 将会拯救我的生命
[01:53.56]他们没法坚持下去
[01:55.22]//
[01:55.69]他的命都是我的 应该好好感谢我
[01:58.86]他眼中满是痛苦 整夜不停地胡思乱想
[02:02.47]想要回到最开始的地方
[02:06.74]派对生活 就在我的心中
[02:12.89]很快 我想要的都有了 我却觉得什么都不长久
[02:17.67]理解这种痛苦
